entry.title: Sunday: Chance of snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
